name: Escher's Experience
description:
The purpose of the Escher's Experience application is to introduce the user to the world of M. C. Escher, in particular to his artwork Relativity, through an immersive aesthetic experience enriched by a system of puzzles that add levels of challenge to the application.

How to play

Live an incredible experience by interactively exploring Escher's famous artwork Relativity!

The experience begins in a museum where it is possible to admire the main artworks of the artist and listen to their descriptions and curiosities.  The user can then literally immerse himself in Relativity by entering the painting and exploring it from different perspectives thanks to the change of gravity.  

It is also possible to interact with some scenes and solve puzzles by entering the various portals in the picture.

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to rotate camera
  • Left mouse button to listen to the audio guides and to interact
  • Right mouse button to change gravity
